TopicTitle: Random structural failures when warp is engaged.

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to get this lander to the Mun: http://imgur.com/GTWyX

Unfortunately, after warping to apoapsis during the ascent stage the three 'wings' on the side all fall off. I've tried strutting them, I've tried repositioning them, nothing works.
It sounds like the same problem a couple of us had with the little 20 thrust engines. Do they just float away without any explosion sound and no entry on the F3 report?
They do just float away with no sound, but it's recorded on the mission log as "structural failure".

Sounds like it's not quite the same then, but might be related. Anyway, if you're interested, here's my thread on the subject: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/16038-WTF-Engines-falling-off?highlight=engines+falling
No solutions? Dammit, I was really getting fond of that whole Christmas tree look.
